Text:
The IMDB review is quite interesting, it ends with: "you got your fair warning - just don't watch it." That comment kind-of makes one want to see it.
The language of this offerinig isn't specified, I hope it has, at very least English subs, 'cause I don't do Bulgarian very well!
Thank you. Excellent quality. Fine movie. And, yes, it is primarily in English, with English subs... I do speak other languages, just not Bulgarian :)
